
--- Problem 1 ---

Sum. Don't forget to as.numeric your inputs, doofus.

```{r}

x <- tibble(x = as.numeric(input)) |>  
  mutate(
    increase = x > lag(x)
  )
sum(x$increase, na.rm = TRUE)

```

--- Problem 2 ---

Rolling sums.

```{r}

y <- tibble(x = as.numeric(input)) |> 
  mutate(
    y = lead(x),
    z = lead(x,2),
    sum = x + y + z
  ) |> 
  filter(!is.na(sum)) |> 
  mutate(increase = sum > lag(sum))

sum(y$increase, na.rm = TRUE)

```
